rows: The current status of the loan (e.g., "Active," "Closed," "Delinquent"). Required.
Individual customer affiliated with this loan. If populated, a separate block displays the customer's profile details (name, age, location, email, and primary phone numbers).
Type of loan (e.g., "Unsecured personal loans"). Determines the layout and fields shown on the page.
Subtype of loan, filtered by type (e.g., "Debt consolidation loan").
The product activated using the loan.
Contract associated with the loan. Required.
Application used to create the loan.
Branch or division responsible for the loan.
html:
Field

Description

Status

The current status of the loan (e.g., "Active," "Closed," "Delinquent"). Required.

Number

Unique loan number. Required.

Contact

Individual customer affiliated with this loan. If populated, a separate block displays the customer's profile details (name, age, location, email, and primary phone numbers).

Type

Type of loan (e.g., "Unsecured personal loans"). Determines the layout and fields shown on the page.

Subtype

Subtype of loan, filtered by type (e.g., "Debt consolidation loan").

Product

The product activated using the loan.

Contract

Contract associated with the loan. Required.

Application

Application used to create the loan.

Branch

Branch or division responsible for the loan.
